title: EVote: Blockchain Voting System
description: A revolutionary voting platform that leverages blockchain technology to ensure tamper-proof, transparent elections. Features include real-time vote verification, voter anonymity, and immutable records. Built with Flutter for the frontend and Ethereum smart contracts for the backend.

title: OneKey-Deploy
description: A CLI tool for seamless deployment of applications to multiple cloud platforms with a single command. Supports major cloud providers with automated configuration.

title: Resume Builder
description: A Flutter-based application to create professional resumes with customizable templates and real-time previews. Designed for ease of use with a drag-and-drop interface.

title: Career Finder App
description: An AI-powered career guidance application that matches users with ideal career paths based on their skills, interests, and personality. The app features a comprehensive assessment system and provides detailed career roadmaps with resource recommendations.

title: BeFocused Chrome Extension
description: A productivity powerhouse that helps users stay focused with distraction blocking, focus sprints, and activity analytics. Provides smart nudges and productivity insights based on your work patterns.

title: GDGC AMU Hosted Backend
description: A robust Node.js backend hosted on Render, supporting a women safety app with Google-based authentication, real-time location APIs, and gamified user engagement. Features include secure login/signup with Google OAuth, SOS request handling, AI-based activity flags, and gamification endpoints for tracking user points, rewards, and safety streaks.
